decision_conditions:
3 YEAR CONSENT PERIOD FOR LBC: The works hereby permitted shall be begun not later than three years from the date of this consent.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 18(1)(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
Application Ref. P2014/1467/LBC, 35 Alwyne Villas, London N1 2HG, Listed building application in connection with replacement of flat roof covering and roof glazing to existing single storey rear extension. Approved with conditions 27/06/2014.

Application Ref. P2015/0467/LBC, 35 Alwyne Villas, London N1 2HG, Listed Building Consent application in connection with raising a section of the party wall parapet by two brick courses to accommodate flashings to the replacement roof glazing, following approval P2014/1467/LBC. Approved with conditions 09/03/2015. 

Application Ref. P2015/0465/NMA, 35 Alwyne Villas, London N1 2HG, Increase height of the parapet wall adjacent to glazing by two brick courses. Approved 09/03/2015.
description: Installation of inground meter box and 22mm diameter copper piping underground and into the property under front step.
